sense.gloss: red and white, colours for festive or auspicious occasions (colors)
Kōhaku Uta Gassen, annual contest between male and female popular singers on New Year's Eve (sponsored and broadcast by NHK)

sdata.j: |↑紅白|↑↓こうはく↓の↑旗↑↓はた↓が↑風↑↓かぜ↓になびいていた。
sdata.e: A red and white flag was flying in the wind.

sdata.j: |↑紅白|↑↓こうはく↓の↑旗↑↓はた↓が↑風↑↓かぜ↓になびいていた。
sdata.e: The red and white flag fluttered in the wind.
